extension.summary: Weather forecasting and radar images for Australia using Bureau of Meteorology data
extension.description: Weather forecast data scraped from the Australian Bureau of Meteorology via WeatherZone - www.bom.gov.au and www.weatherzone.com.au. For full features (e.g. radar) make sure you install the replacement skin files found via the addon wiki (https://kodi.wiki/index.php?title=Add-on:Oz_Weather).
extension.disclaimer: Use of this addon implies you agree to the following terms and conditions - http://reg.bom.gov.au/other/copyright.shtml and http://reg.bom.gov.au/other/disclaimer.shtml
